System Requirements

Minimum System Requirements:

  • .NET Framework 2.0 or later
  • Windows 98 or later.

  • 20 MB of available hard disk space plus an additional 50 for Windows SWAP
  • 32 MB of RAM
  • Microsoft Windows compatible keyboard and mouse
  • Intel Pentium 2 Processor with a 300 MHZ CPU or equivalent and greater
  • A Monitor and video card that is capable of handling a resolution of 800x600 or greater at 60 hertz

  • A full installation of Populous the Beginning and all met system requirements

Recommended Requirements

  • Windows XP (Professional or Home Edition), Vista

  • 30 MB of available hard disk space plus support for Microsoft Virtual Memory
  • 128MB of RAM
  • Microsoft Windows compatible keyboard and mouse
  • Intel Pentium 3 Processor with a 600 MHZ CPU or equivalent and greater
  • A monitor that can handle a resolution of 800x600 or greater at 60 hertz

  • Any video card with at least 32 MB of Video RAM and supports Direct 3D or TnL
  • A full install of Populous and all met recommended system requirements

These system requirements should be met in order to run everything included in this package.

You must have .Net Framework 2.0 in order for the Symmetry Tool to run. This can be obtained at http://www.microsoft.com/downloads/details.aspx?FamilyID=0856EACB-4362-4B0D-8EDD-AAB15C5E04F5.
